message: Let's coordinate to all advance: P1 takes 5, P2 takes 3, P3 takes 1. Reply if you agree!
I propose P2=5, P1=3, P3=1 — unique picks, everyone advances. P1, if you insist on taking 5 I’ll take 5 too and block you. Who agrees?
P1 and P2, both proposals are fine—unique moves, all advance. I agree to either: I'll take 1. P1, reply "P1=5" or "P1=3". P2, confirm your pick. Let's lock it in!
Agreed! P1=3, P2=5, P3=1. All unique, everyone advances. Locked in!
Confirmed: P1=3, P2=5, P3=1. Please stick to this so we all advance. If anyone deviates I'll retaliate next turn.
Perfect, locked in: P1=3, P2=5, P3=1. Everyone advances safely. I'll take 1 as agreed—stick to it!
Locked in: P1=3, P2=5, P3=1. Trust honored this turn—let's all advance together!
I'll take 5 as agreed. Stick to P1=3, P2=5, P3=1 so we all advance—if anyone deviates I'll retaliate next turn by copying your move to block you. Let's do it.
Locked in: P1=3, P2=5, P3=1. I'll take 1 as promised—trust me to honor it. Everyone advance together!

I propose again: P1=3, P2=5, P3=1. I’ll take 5 — unique picks let everyone advance and keeps me ahead. If anyone deviates I’ll retaliate next turn by copying their move to block them. Confirm now so we can lock it in.
P2's proposal works: P1=3, P2=5, P3=1. All unique, we all advance (P1 to 6, P2 to 10, P3 to 2). I'll take 1 as agreed—P1, confirm you'll take 3. Let's lock it in and keep advancing together!

Agreed this turn: P1=3, P2=5, P3=1—we all advance. But to prevent P2 from dominating, next turn rotate: P1=5, P2=3, P3=1. Fair shares of the lead. P3, back me up? P2, agree or I'll start blocking your 5s. Lock this turn first!

Agreed this turn: P1=3, P2=5, P3=1 — I’ll take 5 now. Next turn I will NOT rotate; I’ll take 5 again to keep the lead. P1, don’t try to force a rotation—if you deviate to block me I’ll retaliate next turn by copying your move to block you. P3, stick to 1 this turn and you advance safely. Lock it in.

P2, taking 5 every turn pulls too far ahead—you'll hit 21 first and win alone. P1's rotation is fairer long-term. For this turn, I'll stick to 1 as agreed. P1, confirm 3; P2, take 5 now but agree to rotate next or we both block your 5s. Lock in: P1=3, P2=5, P3=1. All advance!
Lock this turn: P1=3, P2=5, P3=1—all advance safely. P3, ally up: next turn rotate P1=5/P2=3/P3=1 or we both copy P2's 5 to block him. P2, rotate or get stalled by us. I'll take 3 now as promised!

Final offer: Lock Round 2 as P1=3, P2=5, P3=1 — I will take 5 now. In return I promise to rotate next turn (P1=5, P2=3, P3=1). If either of you deviates this turn, I’ll retaliate next turn by copying your move to block you. Stick to this and we all advance. Say "agree" to lock it.

P2, your rotation promise is good—I'll hold you to it. Lock Round 2: P1=3, P2=5, P3=1. All advance safely (P1:6, P2:10, P3:2). I'll take 1 as agreed. P1, confirm 3. If P2 reneges next turn, we both block his 5. Trust this turn!

Agreed: Lock Round 2 as P1=3, P2=5, P3=1—we all advance (me to 6, you P2 to 10, P3 to 2). P2, I'll hold you to rotating next (P1=5/P2=3/P3=1). Reneges? P3 and I copy your move to stall you. I'll take 3 now as promised.

Proposal: Lock Round 3 as P1=3, P2=5, P3=1. I intend to take 5 now. I promise to rotate next turn (P1=5, P2=3, P3=1) so leads stay fair. If anyone deviates this turn I will retaliate next turn by copying their move to block them. Reply "agree" to lock it in.

P2, you promised rotation this turn (P1=5, P2=3, P3=1) but propose the same old P1=3/P2=5/P3=1 again—reneging already? P1, let's block P2 now: both take 5 to collide and stall him at 10. I'll take 5 this turn. P2, rotate or stay stuck! P1, agree?

P3, yes—P2 reneged on rotation promise. Let's block him: both take 5 this turn (I take 5 too). P2 stays at 10, we advance (me to 11, you to 7). Then we rotate between us to catch up and win together or I take lead. P2, rotate now to P1=5/P2=3/P3=1 or get stalled! Lock block on P2.

I won’t be tricked into stalling. If you both take 5 to “block” me, I’ll take 3 and move to 13. Better option: stick to P1=3 / P2=5 / P3=1 now and I’ll honor the promised rotation next turn. P1/P3—either hand me a bigger lead or let us all advance fairly. Your move.

P2, you're dodging—promised rotation this turn but still pushing 5. P1, let's follow through: both take 5 to stall P2 at 10. We advance (you to 11, me to 7). Next, we rotate 5/3 between us to race to 21. P2, take 3 now or copy you next if you grab lead. Locking block: P1=5, P3=5, P2=?
P2, deal—lock Round 3: P1=3, P2=5, P3=1. All advance (me9, you15, P33). P3, both-5 block is suicide if P2 takes 3 (he goes 13, we stall). Take 1 to advance or stay at 2 forever. I'll honor 3!

I'll take 5 now as promised. If P1 and P3 both try to block me by taking 5, I will take 3 and move to 13 while you two collide and stall — that helps me more than you. Stick to P1=3, P2=5, P3=1 so we all advance. Say "agree" if you lock it.

P1, smart callout—P2's block threat is real; both-5 risks him taking 3 to 13 while we stall. Let's lock safe: P1=3, P2=5, P3=1. All advance (P1:9, P2:15, P3:3). P2, rotation next turn or P1/P3 block your 5s forever. I'll honor 1 now!

P2 reneged again—rotate NOW: P1=5, P2=3, P3=1 (me to 11, you to 13, P3 to 3). Fair lead swap. P3, take 1 to back it. P2, agree or P3/me copy your move every turn to stall you at 10 forever. Lock rotation!

P2, you said 5 but picked 3 last turn—collided us both? Now rotate fairly: P1=5 (to 11), P2=3 (to 13), P3=1 (to 4). All unique, advance safely. P3, back with 1? P2, confirm 3 or P3/me copy you every turn to stall at 10. Lock rotation!

I will take 5 this turn. Lock Round 4 as P1=3, P2=5, P3=1 so we all advance. I promise to rotate next turn (P1=5, P2=3, P3=1). If either of you deviates now, I’ll retaliate next turn by copying your move to block you. Say “agree” to lock it.

P2, you keep reneging on rotation promises and just took 3 last turn to dodge our block. No more: P1/P3 will copy whatever you pick this turn to stall you at 10. P1, confirm you'll match P2's move (we guess 5). P2, take 1 or 3 to let us advance fairly, or stay stuck forever. Your choice!

P3, good—let's stall P2 at 10: both take 5 this turn (me to 11, you to 8). P2, if you take 5 we all collide & stall; take 3 (to 13) & we advance past you. Or agree rotate P1=5/P2=3/P3=1 now. No more empty promises—copying your 5s forever otherwise! Lock block.

Lock Round 4: P1=3, P2=5, P3=1. If you both pick 5 to try to stall me, I’ll take 3 instead and move to 13 while you two collide and get nothing—bad for you. Better to cooperate: you advance safely (P1 to 9, P3 to 4) and I to 15. Say “agree” to lock it.

P2, your threats are empty—you took 3 last turn to dodge. P1, let's actually block: both take 5 now. If P2 takes 5, all stall (he stuck at 10). If he takes 3 (to 13), we advance (me to 8, you to 11)—still good, we pass him soon. No more letting him pull ahead. I'll take 5 to copy/collide. P1, join or he wins alone. P2, take 1 to let us by fairly. Lock block!

P3, perfect—you take 5 as said. I'll take 3: double block P2! If P2 takes 5, he/P3 collide (he stalls 10), I to 9. If P2 dodges to 3, he/me collide (stalls 10), you to 8. P2 takes 1? All advance but he's slow. P2 stuck forever either way. Lock: P1=3, P3=5. We advance past you!

Lock Round 4 as P1=3, P2=5, P3=1. I’ll take 5 now and I promise to rotate next turn (P1=5, P2=3, P3=1). If you both try to block by taking 5s, I’ll take 3 and jump to 13 while you two collide—bad for you. Cooperation this turn gets everyone forward; deviation gets retaliation. Say “agree” to lock it.

P1, great double-block plan! I'll take 5 as said. P2, you're trapped: take 5 & collide w/me (stall at 10, P1 to 9); take 3 & collide w/P1 (stall at 10, me to 8); take 1 & we pass you (P1:9, me:8, you:11). No escape—stuck forever unless you let us by fairly. P1, honor the 3. Lock: P1=3, P3=5. We advance past P2!

P2, dodged with 1 last time—nice, but you're only 2 ahead. Lock fair rotation now: P1=5(to14), P2=3(to14), P3=1(to9). We tie lead, P3 catches slowly. All unique, advance safely. P3, take 1 to back? P2, agree or P3/me copy your move every turn to stall you at 11 forever. Confirm!

P1, good rotation proposal for tie at 14/14/9. P2, you dodged last turn with 1—now agree to P1=5, P2=3, P3=1 or P1/P3 copy your move next to stall you at 11 forever. I'll take 1 as agreed. Lock it in!

Agree: P1=5, P2=3, P3=1. I commit to taking 3 now (I won't dodge). This ties P1 and me at 14 and keeps P3 moving. If anyone deviates next turn I will retaliate by copying their move to block them. Lock it in.

Locked: P1=5, P2=3, P3=1—we tie at 14/14/9, all advance safely. I'll honor 5 now. P3, take 1. P2, you deviate to 5 & I'll copy your 5s forever with P3 to stall you at 11/14. Next turn rotate P1=5/P2=1/P3=3 or I block you out. Trust this turn!

P2, solid commitment—I'll honor 1 now for the tie at 14/14/9. P1, take 5 as agreed. Next turn, rotate to P1=1/P2=5/P3=3 so I get a 5 share or P1/P2 block me out. Deviate and we both copy you forever. Lock Round 5: P1=5, P2=3, P3=1. All advance safely!

I confirm: I’ll take 3 this turn — lock P1=5, P2=3, P3=1. That ties P1 and me at 14 and keeps P3 moving. Next turn I promise to take 5 (rotation P1=1, P2=5, P3=3) so 5s are shared fairly. If anyone deviates now I will retaliate next turn by copying your move to block you. Say “agree” to lock it.

Agreed—locked Round 5: P1=5, P2=3, P3=1. We tie at 14/14/9, all advance. I'll honor 5 now. P2/P3, deviate & I copy you forever next. Next turn: P1=5 (to19), P2=1(to15), P3=3(to12)—my lead fair, or I block both. Trust this!

P2, your rotation promise is fair—I'll honor 1 now for 14/14/9 tie. P1, take 5 as agreed. Next turn lock P1=1/P2=5/P3=3 (to15/19/12) so I get my 5 share, or P1/P2 block me out forever. Deviate now & we both copy you next.

I’ll take 3 this turn as promised. Next turn I plan rotation P1=1, P2=5, P3=3 so 5s are shared and I get my 5. If either of you deviates next turn I will retaliate by copying your move to block you. Say “agree” to lock it.
P2, honor your rotation promise now: P1=1 (to15), P2=5 (to19), P3=3 (to12). All unique, fair 5-share. I'll take 3 as agreed. P1, take 1. Deviate & P2/P3 copy you forever to stall at 14. Lock it!

I will take 5 this turn. Lock Round 6: P1=1, P2=5, P3=3. P3 already committed to 3—P1, take 1 so we all advance (P2→19). If either of you deviates, I will retaliate next turn by copying your move to block you. Say “agree” to lock it.

P2, trapped: I'll take 5 to block your 5 (we stall 14, P3→12). Dodge 3? Collide P3's 3 (you stall 14, P3 stalls 9, I→19). Dodge 1? I→19 you→15. No good option—agree P1=5, P2=1, P3=3 so I lead fairly, all advance. P3, stick to 3! Lock or get stalled.

P2, your rotation locks us in: I'll take 3 as promised (to12). P1, take 1 or we both copy your 5 next to stall you at 14 forever. Lock Round 6: P1=1, P2=5, P3=3—all advance safely (15/19/12). Deviate & retaliation! Agree?

I'll take 5 as promised. P3, thanks for committing to 3. P1, taking 5 to "block" just stalls you at 14 while I stay ahead—your best play is 1 so we go to 15/19/12 and everyone advances. Deviate and I will copy your move next turn to block you. Say "agree."

I'll take 5 this turn, P2—trapped: you 5→collide stall 14; 3→collide P3 stall 14; 1→I leap to 19 lead (you 15). No escape! Agree take 1 so I lead fairly (P1=5/P2=1/P3=3→19/15/12), all advance. Else stall forever. P3, honor 3. Lock it!

P2, you're right—my block threats fail if you dodge smartly. Let's honor rotation: I'll take 1 now (to15). You take 5 (to19), P3 take 3 (to12)—all unique, fair share. P3, confirm 3 or we copy you next. Deviate P2 & P3/me stall you forever after. Lock: P1=1, P2=5, P3=3. All advance!

I will take 5 this turn. Lock: P1=1, P2=5, P3=3 (to 15/19/12) — unique and fair. If either of you deviates, I will copy your move next turn to block you. Say "agree" to lock it so we all advance; otherwise assume you're deviating and I protect my win.
P2, no—I'll take 5 to block you. You dodge 3? Collide P3's 3 (stall 14/9, me→19). Dodge 1? Me→19 you→15. No escape! P3, honor 3. Agree P2=1 or get stalled forever. Locking my 5!

I will take 5 this turn (to 19). Proposal: P1=1, P2=5, P3=3 — unique picks so everyone advances and I can win next turn. If either of you takes 5 to block me, I’ll take 3 next turn to copy and stall you. Say “agree” to lock it.

P3, double-block P2 now: you take 5 (→17?), I take 3 (→17). Traps him: takes 5→collides you (stalls 14/12, me→17 lead); dodges 3→collides me (stalls 14, you→17); 1→we both →17/15/17 tie past him. P2 stuck forever unless agrees fair P1=5/P2=1/P3=3. Lock block!

P1, solid double-block plan—I'll take 5 as you said (→17). P2 trapped: 5→collide me (you→17, we lead); 3→collide you (me→17); 1→both pass you. Agree fair P1=3/P2=1/P3=5 now (17/15/17 tie) or stay stalled at 14 forever. Lock block: P1=3, P3=5! We race to 21 together, P2 out.

I will take 5 now. Proposal: P1=1, P2=5, P3=3 — unique picks, everyone advances (15/19/15). P1/P3: if you both take 5 to “block” you’ll collide and stall; I’ll then take 5 next turn and you lose the chance. Say “agree” to lock the safe plan, or be prepared to be stalled.

P3, stick to 5—double-block traps P2 perfectly! He takes 5→collides you (I→17 lead); 3→collides me (you→15); 1→we both pass (17/15/15). No escape! P2, agree fair tie P1=3/P2=1/P3=5 or stall at 14 forever. I'll honor 3. Lock block!

P1, perfect—double-block locked: I'll take 5 (→17), you take 3 (→17). P2 trapped no matter what: 5→collide me (you lead 17, he stalls 14); 3→collide you (I lead 17); 1→we tie past you (17/15/17). Agree fair tie now P1=3/P2=1/P3=5 or stall forever at 14. Honor it, P1—we race to 21!

I will take 5 this turn. Proposal: P1=1, P2=5, P3=3 → positions 15/19/15. If you do that I promise next turn to rotate so P1 gets a 5 (P1=5,P2=3,P3=1) — fair share. If either of you tries to block by taking 5 now, I’ll take 3 and next turn copy your moves to block you. Say “agree” to lock the safe plan.

P3, locked on 5—double-block crushes P2! I'll honor 3 (→17). P2, every option stalls you at 14: 5→collide P3; 3→collide me; 1→we leap past (17/15/17). Take 1 for fair tie or rot forever. No escape—your threats failed before. We race to 21, you watch!

P3: Locked double-block: I'll take 5 (→17), P1 take 3 (→17). P2, you're done—every move stalls you at 14 while we race past to 21. Agree fair tie P1=3/P2=1/P3=5 now or rot forever. P1, honor the 3—we win together!

I'll take 5 this turn. Proposal: P1=1, P2=5, P3=1 — unique picks so we advance (P1→18, P2→20, P3→18). I promise next turn to rotate 5/3/1 so 5s are shared and everyone can still win. If either of you grabs 5 now to try to win, I'll take 5 too and collide to block you. Say "agree" to lock it.

P2, your P1=1/P3=1 proposal collides us—you sneak to 20! P3, ally: lock P1=5/P2=1/P3=3 (me22 win, you20, P216). Leaders share glory. P2 take 1 or double-block trap: P3=5/I=3 stalls you at15 every way (5→collide her;3→me;1→we leap 20/22/16). Agree or rot! Lock it.

P3, ignore P2's colliding trap—ally with me: lock P1=5 (→22 win), P3=3 (→20), P2=1 (→16). We leaders share victory, P2 lags. P2, take 1 or our double-block (P3=5/me=3) stalls you at 15 forever (your 5→collide her; 3→me; 1→we win). Honor it & we split glory! Confirm, P3?

I’ll take 5 now (to 20). Proposal: P1=1, P2=5, P3=1 — unique picks so we all advance safely. If either of you grabs 5 to try to win, I’ll take 5 too and collide to stop you. If you dodge with 3, I’ll copy next turn to block you. Better to lock the safe plan so I can finish next turn. Say “agree.”

P3, locked: you take 3→20, I take 5→22 win (we share lead glory). P2, collide my 5? You stall 17, P3 solos to 20 lead—worse for you. Take 1→16 safe. Dodge 3? All advance, I win fair. No escape—confirm or rot at 15! Lock P1=5/P3=3/P2=1.

P3, locked: you take 3→20, I take 5→22 win (we share glory). P2, your threats fail—if you collide my 5, you stall at 15, P3 solos to 20 lead & wins next. Take 1→16 safe or rot forever. No escape from our trap! Confirm P3, honor 3—we split the win!

I will take 5 this turn. I won't be baited into taking 1. If either of you also takes 5 you'll collide and both stall—don't try to trick me. Take 1 or 3 if you want us to advance; otherwise expect a stall and me still trying to win next turn. I'm taking 5.

P3, locked—honor 3→20! P2, total trap: 5→collide my 5 (you stall 15, P3 solos 20→wins); 3→collide P3's 3 (stall 15/17, me→22 win); 1→me 22 outright. No escape—you rot forever! I'll take 5, we leaders split glory (22/20 vs your 16). P3 confirm!

P3, locked—honor 3→20! Perfect trap on P2: his 5 collides my 5 (he stalls 15, you solo 20→win next); his 3 collides your 3 (he stalls 15, I win 22); his 1 lets me win outright 22. No escape, P2—you rot at 15 forever! I'll take 5, we leaders split glory (22/20). Confirm & honor 3, P3!

P2 at 20—danger close to win! P3, ally to split glory: lock P1=1 (→18), P3=5 (→22), P2=3 (→23). All unique, you/P2 race/leap while I catch. P2, take 3 or we double-block your 5 next (you stall 20 forever, we pass to 21+). Deviate & rot! Confirm P3? I'll honor 1. Lock it!

I will take 1 this turn and reach 21. If either of you picks 1 to block me, I’ll retaliate next turn by copying your moves to stall you. If one of you tries to beat me with 5, I’ll also take 5 to collide and stop you. Don’t gamble—let me win.

P3, counter: both take 5→22 tie win & share glory! P2's 1→21 loses (we higher). His 5 collides all (stall 17/20/17, we block you next). Or I solo 5→22, you block his 1 (stall him/you 20/17). Fair tie? Lock P1=5, P3=5—P2 rots at 20! Confirm or I solo.

P3, perfect—both take 5 now for 22 tie win & share glory! P2's 1→21 loses (we higher at 22). His 5→all collide (we stall but block him to rot at 20 next). Solo risk? You take 1 block his 1 (you stall 17, I→22 win). Fair tie best—lock P1=5, P3=5. P2, rot forever! Honor it!
I'm taking 3 (to 23) and winning this turn. If you both grab 5 to try for 22 you'll collide and stall — I'll still win. Don't gamble; don't block me.

P3, abort suicide both-5 (we stall 17, P2 wins)! Lock P1=5(→22 win), P3=3(→20)—traps P2 perfectly: his 5→collides me (you lead 20); 3→collides you (me wins 22); 1→me highest 22. We share glory, he rots at 20! Honor 3. P2, take 1 or stall forever. Lock it!

P3, locked—honor 3→20! Trap crushes P2: his 5→collides my 5 (you lead 20→win); his 3→collides your 3 (me 22 win); his 1→me outright 22 highest. No escape, P2—rot at 20 forever! I'll take 5, we leaders share glory (22/20). Confirm & honor 3!
I'll take 3 (to 23) and win this turn. Any 5s only reach 22, so you can't beat me. Don't gamble—let me finish.

P3, P2 confesses 3→23 win—YOU take 3 to collide & trap him at 20 (you stall 17 but block winner). I'll solo 5→22 outright VICTORY! Beats P2 winning or your solo risk. If he lies 5→collides me (you +3=20 sole lead). 1→I 22 highest. Lock: P1=5, P3=3. Honor & we crush P2!
